basics.name: Marin Carroll
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: I've worked as a web developer for 6 years professionally (15+ years as a hobbyist!), and I specialize in WordPress.

work.name: Northeastern University
work.summary: In External Affairs' fast-paced newsroom, we continually work to improve user engagement and performance for Northeastern Global News and related microsites. I specialize in custom block development that enhances news content, but I also spend quite a bit of time maintaining & modernizing our large codebase.

work.name: Image Conscious Studios
work.summary: ICS is a creative agency specializing in web (mostly WordPress, occasionally Shopify). Most projects involved custom block & theme development, integrating 3rd-party APIs, and GSAP animations/scrollytelling. I also worked with PMs on estimates/timelines, interfaced with clients, and did some UI design work.

work.name: Image Conscious Studios
work.summary: As an apprentice, I split my time between web development and UI design.

etcetera: I generally don't freelance, but I do provide low-cost or paid-in-kind services if a select project piques my interest. I'm especially interested in music-industry sites â€“ please reach out if you have a project in mind!
